agentArns.description: A list of DataSync Agent ARNs with which this location will be associated.

arn.description: Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the DataSync Location.

domain.description: The name of the Windows domain the SMB server belongs to.

mountOptions.description: Configuration block containing mount options used by DataSync to access the SMB Server. Can be `AUTOMATIC`, `SMB2`, or `SMB3`.

password.description: The password of the user who can mount the share and has file permissions in the SMB.

serverHostname.description: Specifies the IP address or DNS name of the SMB server. The DataSync Agent(s) use this to mount the SMB share.

subdirectory.description: Subdirectory to perform actions as source or destination. Should be exported by the NFS server.

tags.description: Key-value pairs of resource tags to assign to the DataSync Location. If configured with a provider `default_tags` configuration block present, tags with matching keys will overwrite those defined at the provider-level.

tagsAll.description: A map of tags assigned to the resource, including those inherited from the provider `default_tags` configuration block.

user.description: The user who can mount the share and has file and folder permissions in the SMB share.
